content:
Ingredients: Boiled potatoes ðŸ¥”Â - Mashed - Â 1 Bowl Red chilli powder - 1 teaspoon Red chilli flakes - 1/2 tb sp Oregano - 1/2 teaspoon Ginger-Garlic paste - 1 teaspoon Corn flour - 2 tb sp Salt - to taste Bread crumbs - 1/2 cup Corn flour paste - 1 small cup Oil - To deep fry Procedure:
  • Take a bowl Add mashed potatoes
  • Add red chilly powder, red chilly flakes, oregano, ginger-garlic paste, salt and corn flour
  • Mix them well
  • Next Make potato nuggets like oval/ cylinder shape
  • keep them aside
  • Each potato Nugget Dust in corn flour
  • Dip in corn flour paste
  • Next take out potato nuggets from dip and roll in bread crumbs
  • Apply bread crumbs on them completely
  • Repeat the same process till the potato mixture completes
  • Heat oil to deep fry
  • Fry in medium to high heat
  • Take out potato nuggets when color changes to golden brown
  • Serve it hot in rainy/ winter season , evenings/ starters with tomato sauce/ any Dip
